JobTitle: Product Marketing Manager, Small Business Programs
JobFullDesc: Facebook seeks an experienced professional with a strong background in product marketing and project management to support go-to-market prioritization and strategy for our small business advertiser solutions. The ideal candidate will have experience in product marketing or small business product development. They should be passionate about building product solutions that serve small businesses and excited by the challenge of developing creative go-to-market plans with limited resources. They must be able to build productive cross-functional relationships and exhibit excellent critical thinking skills. They must also have experience influencing stakeholders in a highly-matrixed organization.Excellent cross-functional leadership, ability to manage multiple concurrent projects, and comfort with a fast-paced, ambiguous environment is a must. This person should have empathy for people and businesses, as well as internal stakeholders like sales and product teams. The ideal candidate will also have a strong understanding of digital advertising platforms, a track record of resilience under pressure, and a vision for how we can better meet the needs of our small
